source_item.name: Lesser Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string: Set: Your damaging spells have a chance to hit a Jackpot!, launching a Shattering Star at 3 nearby enemies at 100% effectiveness. Casting Dragonrage always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Casting Shattering Star or hitting a Jackpot! increases the damage of your next empower spell by 25%, stacking up to 2 times.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,934 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 209 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells have a chance to destabilize the void energy, releasing a corrupted fragment. Retrieving a fragment briefly infuses you with its power, increasing your Intellect by 13,418 for 15 sec.

name: Best-in-Slots

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to grant you 4,093 to 5,003 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec.
Use: Cheat to immediately gain 5,003 of your highest secondary stat for 15 sec. While out of combat, reconfigure for melee combat instead. (2 Min Cooldown)

description: The wise goblin makes their own luck.
